amendment.description: Use of revenues from lease payments from Metropolitan Washington Airports for aviation safety improvements and other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2847 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 367.
